pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cppy====.. image:: https://github.com/nucleic/cppy/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg :target: https://github.com/nucleic/cppy/actions/workflows/ci.ymlA small C++ header library which makes it easier to write Python extensionmodules. The primary feature is a PyObject smart pointer which automaticallyhandles reference counting and provides convenience methods for performingcommon object operations.
